clients.title: My Clients
clients.subtitle: Manage and communicate with your clients

chatbot.pii_warning: ‚ö†Ô∏è I detected sensitive information (SSN/ITIN). For your security, please **do not** share these details in the chat. Use our secure Document Upload feature instead.

greeting: Hello! I'm Nerea, your AI Tax Assistant. Ready to get your taxes sorted?
Hi there! I'm Nerea. How can I make your tax season easier today?
Greetings! I'm Nerea, here to help you maximize your refund. What's on your mind?
responses.wizard_help: I'm right here with you. What do you need help with?
responses.security_check:
Your security is our top priority.

We use **256-bit End-to-End Encryption** for all uploads. Your documents are safer here than in a filing cabinet!
responses.file_types:
We accept **PDF, JPG, and PNG** files up to 25MB.

Make sure the text is clear and legible for our AI to extract the data accurately.
responses.thanks: You're very welcome! Is there anything else I can help you with?
responses.goodbye: Goodbye! Come back if you have more questions. Happy filing!
responses.joke:
Why did the auditor cross the road?

To look at the chicken's receipts! üêîüßæ
responses.check_status:
Your 2026 Federal Return is currently **Processing**.

We filed it on Jan 18, 2026. The IRS typically accepts returns within 24-48 hours.
responses.check_status_dashboard: I see you're on the dashboard. Your 2026 Federal Return status is currently **Processing**.
responses.estimate_refund:
Based on your latest data, your estimated Federal Refund is **$2,450**.

This amount is subject to final IRS approval.
responses.estimate_refund_dashboard:
According to your dashboard, your estimated Federal Refund is **$2,450**.

This amount is pending IRS approval.
responses.upload_docs: You can securely upload your W-2s, 1099s, and other tax documents here.
responses.talk_to_human:
I can connect you with a certified tax professional.

Please note that live support is a **Premium** feature. Would you like to upgrade?
responses.upgrade: Great choice! Premium includes audit protection, live support, and priority processing.
responses.help: I can help you check your **return status**, estimate your **refund**, or **upload documents**. What would you like to do?
responses.deadline:
For the 2026 tax year, the filing deadline is **April 15, 2027**.

If you need more time, you can file an extension.
responses.extension:
You can file **Form 4868** to get an automatic 6-month extension until October 15.

Remember, an extension to file is **not** an extension to pay any taxes due!
responses.eligibility_pets:
Generally, you **cannot** claim pets as dependents. üê∂

However, if your dog is a certified service animal for a medical condition, expenses might be deductible.
responses.eligibility_general: Tax eligibility depends on many factors. I can help with general rules, but for specific situations, a tax pro is best.
responses.unknown: I'm still learning! I didn't quite catch that. You can ask me about your **return status**, **refund estimate**, or how to **upload documents**.
